30 void getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(geometry_msgs::Quaternion orientation, double& roll,double& pitch, double& yaw)
31 {
32  tf::Quaternion quat;
33  // Suppress a weird warning that tells me to normalise the quats even though I do that.
34  if( ros::console::set_logger_level(ROSCONSOLE_DEFAULT_NAME, ros::console::levels::Error) ) ros::console::notifyLoggerLevelsChanged();
35  tf::quaternionMsgToTF(orientation,quat);
36  if( ros::console::set_logger_level(ROSCONSOLE_DEFAULT_NAME, ros::console::levels::Info) ) ros::console::notifyLoggerLevelsChanged();
37  quat.normalize();
38 
39  tf::Matrix3x3 mat(quat);
40 
41  mat.getRPY(roll, pitch,yaw);
42 
43 }
44 
45 void poseGrabber(geometry_msgs::PoseStamped::ConstPtr pose)
46 {
47 
48  pose_lock.lock();
49  current_pose.pose.position.x = pose->pose.position.x;
50  current_pose.pose.position.y = pose->pose.position.y;
51  current_pose.pose.position.z = pose->pose.position.z;
52  current_pose.pose.orientation.w = pose->pose.orientation.w;
53  current_pose.pose.orientation.x = pose->pose.orientation.x;
54  current_pose.pose.orientation.y = pose->pose.orientation.y;
55  current_pose.pose.orientation.z = pose->pose.orientation.z;
56  pose_lock.unlock();
57  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Got current pose as x=" << pose->pose.position.x << " saved as " << current_pose.pose.position.x);
58 }

60 void jointGrabber(kinova_msgs::JointAngles joints)
61 {
62  current_joints = joints;
63 }

66 KDL::Frame poseStampedToKDLFrame(geometry_msgs::PoseStamped from_pose)
67 {
68  ros::spinOnce();
69  KDL::Frame to_frame;
70  tf::poseMsgToKDL(from_pose.pose, to_frame);
71  return to_frame;
72 }

75 int main(int argc, char **argv)
76 {
77  ros::init(argc, argv, "velocity_test");
78  ros::NodeHandle nh;
79 
80  //ros::Publisher cmd_vel = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::TwistStamped>("/RobotControl/VelocityControl", 1000);
81  ros::Publisher cmd_vel = nh.advertise<kinova_msgs::PoseVelocity>("/j2s7s300_driver/in/cartesian_velocity", 1000);
82  ros::Subscriber tool_pose = nh.subscribe("/j2s7s300_driver/out/tool_pose",1000, poseGrabber );
83 
84 
85  ros::Publisher joint_pub = nh.advertise<kinova_msgs::ArmJointAnglesActionGoal>("/j2s7s300_driver/joints_action/joint_angles/goal", 1000);
86  ros::Subscriber joint_sub = nh.subscribe("/j2s7s300_driver/out/joint_angles",1000,jointGrabber);
87  while(ros::ok)
88  {
89 
90  if ((current_joints.joint1==0 && current_joints.joint2==0) || (current_pose.pose.position.x ==0 && current_pose.pose.position.y==0) )
91  {
92  // ROS_INFO("Spinning");
93  ros::spinOnce();
94  }
95  else
96  break;
97  }
98 
100 
101  std::string chain_start = "j2s7s300_link_base", chain_end = "j2s7s300_end_effector", urdf_param = "/robot_description";
102  double timeout = 0.005;
103  double eps = 1e-5;
104 
105  KDL::Chain chain;
106  KDL::JntArray ll, ul; //lower joint limits, upper joint limits
107

110  tracik_solver.getKDLLimits(ll,ul);
111 
112  // Set up KDL & TRAC IK
113  KDL::ChainFkSolverPos_recursive fk_solver(chain); // Forward kin. solver
114  KDL::ChainIkSolverVel_pinv vik_solver(chain); // PseudoInverse vel solver
115  KDL::ChainIkSolverPos_NR_JL kdl_solver(chain,ll,ul,fk_solver, vik_solver, 1, eps); // Joint Limit Solver

165  // Current joints updated from Kinova publisher, convert msg to KDL Joint Array

168  current_joints_KDL(1)=current_joints.joint2;

172  current_joints_KDL(5)=current_joints.joint6;
173  current_joints_KDL(6)=current_joints.joint7;
174 
175  // Current pose updated from Kinova publisher, convert msg to KDL frame
176  KDL::Frame target_pose_frame;
177  geometry_msgs::Pose target_pose = current_pose.pose;
178  target_pose.position.x += 0.5;
179  target_pose.position.y += 0.5;
180  target_pose.position.z += 0.5;
181  tf::PoseMsgToKDL(target_pose, target_pose_frame);
182 
183  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current joints : \n" << current_joints_KDL.data);
184  KDL::JntArray result(7);
185  int rc;
186  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Target pose frame : " <<
187  target_pose_frame.p.x() << " " <<
188  target_pose_frame.p.y() << " " <<
189  target_pose_frame.p.z() << " "
190  );
191  rc = tracik_solver.CartToJnt(current_joints_KDL,target_pose_frame,result);
192 // rc = kdl_solver.CartToJnt(current_joints_KDL,target_pose_frame,result);
193  ROS_INFO_STREAM("rc : " << rc << ". New joints : \n " << result.data);
194 
195 
196  kinova_msgs::JointAngles result_joints;
197  result_joints.joint1 = result(0);
198  result_joints.joint2 = result(1);
199  result_joints.joint3 = result(2);
200  result_joints.joint4 = result(3);
201  result_joints.joint5 = result(4);
202  result_joints.joint6 = result(5);
203  result_joints.joint7 = result(6);
204  kinova_msgs::ArmJointAnglesActionGoal goal;
205  goal.goal.angles = result_joints;
206 
207 // joint_pub.publish(goal);
208 
209  ros::spinOnce();
210  return 0;
211 }
